name: line_segment_intersect_ts
description: Line segment intersection algorithm in Typescript.  Fast and well tested.

scripts.clean: rimraf -f build && rimraf -f dist && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir typescript && mkdir rollup && mkdir terser && cd .. && mkdir dist && cd src/ts && rimraf -f generated_code && mkdir generated_code && cd ../..
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run version && npm run typescript && npm run rollup

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
